title: Fullscreen vsync issues
body:
my monitor is capable of running at 100 hz, when i run league in fullscreen the game caps to 60fps but if i run the game in windowed or borderless mode the game caps at 100fps; vsync was on in both situations.

any suggestions as to get vsync working correctly fullscreen? as a few patches ago i was able to run fullscreen 100fps but not anymore.
